item.description:
Lets check out cross country skiing! Join us for a 75 minute lesson (lesson starts at 12pm, we will meet inside the main entrance at 11:45)- then we can try our new skills out!

Here is the info about the intro cross country skiing lesson at the Weston Ski Track:
For a quick introduction to get you started with Cross-Country Skiing, we offer a 75-minute lesson which covers the basics of the classic diagonal stride, turning, and negotiating small hills. Our instructors will present a series of drills designed to gradually improve your skills at a manageable pace. Perfect for those with no skiing experience or no formal instruction.

Includes trail pass valid for the entire day. If you opt to rent skis, the rental is also valid for the day.

IMPORTANT:
Please note: You must reserve and pay online in advance. The lesson is $31. If you need to rent skis there is an additional charge.

Spots will fill up, so please reserve as soon as possible. Make sure you are reserving/buying for the Sunday, January 16, 12pm lesson (there are other lessons on the same day). Here is the link:

Link to buy lesson
For more info on the Weston Ski Track, check out: http://www.skiboston....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside main entrance. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Beginner Cross Country Skiing Lesson & Day Pass, Weston Ski Track
